text:
@politico @SenTedCruz 

At this point in time people need money to pay rent/mortgages, buy food and gas, pay for electricity, phones and internet. Maybe car payments. These are BASIC EXPENSES. Most people Need a job to pay for them. Covid19 has taken them. So Ted, what's your real problem?
